product.title: Chinese Lunar New Year Lion Dancing Nano Building Sets
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Bring luck and fortune to your little world

    Lion dancing plays an important role during the Lunar New Year celebrations. Lion and dragon dances are commonly performed to bring good fortune, and luck and to drive away evil spirits so if you're looking to bring some luck into your life why not start with these detailed building sets?

    During this festive season, businesses will hang a cabbage with a red envelope containing money for the lions to gobble, spitting out the leaves of lettuce to denote new beginnings, luck, and fortune. Why not bring some luck into your home with these awesome Lunar Year building sets?


    🦁 Measures about 4x3x5in / 11x8x13cm
    🦁 Not compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    🦁 Each set has around 1500 nano pieces
    🦁 Sold individually
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    Lion Set

    The lion dance is a traditional Lunar New Year dance performed on big occasions, such as the Spring Festival (Lunar New Year) for good luck. The more skilled performers will perform on stage jumping from pole to pole and even sitting on their partner's shoulder whilst in the lion costume.

    Features

    🦁 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🦁 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🦁 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🦁 High-quality durable non-toxic green material


    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along.

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 6 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks is a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
